title: Binlog redacting - finalize contribution to Arcade
body:
### Context

#8400
Contribute the current work to Arcade for initial piloting

### Goal

* Iterate on the initial prototype: https://github.com/dotnet/arcade/pull/13991
  * Once other subtasks in #8400 are done, update the redactor tool version used
  * Reflect PR comments, engage with Arcade team to get the contribution submitted
